name: Frostfire Robe
tooltip:
Frostfire RobeLevel 60

Archmage Angela Dosantos at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make a Frostfire Robe if you bring her the following: 1 Desecrated Robe, 25 Wartorn Cloth Scraps, 4 Mooncloth and 2 Nexus Crystals.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Robe
- Wartorn Cloth Scrap x 25
- Mooncloth x 4
- Nexus Crystal x 2
